title: How to use the website: Click on one of the buttons to discover a list of charites related to that cause. If you want, you can click on a charity to visit their website and make a donation.
description: Why I made the website: The purpose of this site to to create visiblity of lesser known charities, and raise awareness about non-profit's that are depending on donations...
stack: Tech Stack: HTML, CSS, React, Node.js, Express
